lo23.communication
Interface IReceiveListener

public interface IReceiveListener

This interface allow to notify a receive message, It needs to be implemented by the model. Check also ISender to understand the functioning of messages.

Method Summary
 void notifyAddUser(PublicProfile userProfile)
          Notify the message receive in response to sendMulticast.
 void notifyChatMessage(Message message)
          Notify a chat message.
 void notifyConstantMessage(Constant constant)
          Notify a constant message.

          Notify the end of the current game session.

          Notify the start of a game session.
 void notifyInvitation(Invitation invitation)
          Notify a invitation.
 void notifyInvitationAnswer(Invitation invitation, boolean answer)
          Notify the response to a invitation.

          Notify a movement of a piece.
